website_summaries.verdict: A travel crib that rocks baby to sleep like your bassinet at home.
pros: Comes with a carrying bag that has a carry strap
Has a stationary and a rocking mode
cons: This bassinet travel crib does not have any extra storage space for blankets or diapers

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet (color: Crystal) is perfect. It has all mesh sides. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. I use it as the everyday bassinet as well as folding it down to bring with us when we are not home. It lightweight enough to move easily (Moms - I move it in the bathroom to grab a quick shower!) The feet of the bassinet fold inward for rocking and prop flat for stationary. The bassinet is pictured with the MiClassic fitted sheet. I also find mini crib/ oblong bassinet sheets fit as well. The pad is water resistant for easy clean up which is great for my 7 week old little boy who is in between diaper sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynne

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet
customer_reviews.text: As some other have mentioned in the these reviews about the sides not being mesh is just simply not true. The bassinet has mesh all the way around like it looks in the first few photos. It is really big which is awesome since it looks like we’ll be able to use it for months to come. Setup is super easy and take apart is as well, sometimes the legs are hard to get off but I rather have them sturdy then loose. right now we use it as our daughters bed every night with any issues and have traveled with it a few.
customer_reviews.author: Koop

customer_reviews.title: This thing is BIG.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Great bassinet if you have a ton of room to spare. DO NOT GET IT IF YOU HAVE A SMALL SPACE. You could fit 2 toddlers in this thing easily. And do NOT get the sheets that amazon recommends to buy with it because “other people who bought this bassinet also bought” them. As you can see they are incredibly small for this gargantuan bassinet. I would return it but due to the packaging being too small for the item, I went full Rambo and the box is now unusable. So, in short, only trust the measurements of the bassinet and sheets. Don’t trust the pictures or what amazon recommends.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, spacious, simple-looking
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newborn - our first baby. I like the size and how much room it allows my baby to grow. The design of this bassinet is pretty functional, I can easily see my baby from the side view so I know how he is sleeping. Pretty good bassinet to start with as a new parent.
customer_reviews.author: CocktailMom

customer_reviews.title: Awsome bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little bassinet, it folds up so easy. We took it to camping with us and it was super easy to fold up and it even comes with a bag to put it in. And you have to option for it to rock or not rock which is really cool. I dont know why people spend 300$ on a bassinet that stays in one place. Also it's actually pretty big. My son could probably sleep in it until hes one. Save yourself 200$ and get this neat little thing, From a mother of 2 to another.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea! It's really easy to fold and carry. I can take my baby to my mom's house with his own bassinet.The mattress is also flat and sturdy, not like other small cosleeper. The rocking function is amazing, I use it more often than the normal mode. More perfect if fitted sheet is included. But it's OK for me, my son like his own swaddle and blanket. Price worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: yue

customer_reviews.title: We love this bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We love this bassinet!! We have used it for about 9 months and our little one sleeps like a dream! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good bassinet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized bassinet, I love that I can see through the mesh. I ordered the brolex brand pack and play sized sheets and they fit great and are super soft. I also ordered the MiClassic bassinet sheet but am using it under the fitted sheets as it seems more of a mattress pad. Together they make the bassinet much more comfortable and I can't wait to see my little girl use it once she arrives!
customer_reviews.author: JackStripes08

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking everywhere for a bassinet that could fold up and would function as an actually bed (vs a rock n play). This was perfect!! It folds up great and is huge when it opens. So much better than the bassist I had for daughter. With the high weight limit we can use it until he's able to really sit/climb up.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good!!  I love this bassinet 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet I bought it for my son and he sleep in it at night because his crib is a little bit far from our bed. So this works out really well. The thing about this bassinet is I wish it have extra padding because after a while it sink in. Plus I wish it have a bumper u can get for this bassinet, because I feel like my son have no protection from the side where the metal. When he moves I’m afraid he bumps his head. But other wise good I will recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bassinet. It folds up very easily and is great for travel. I even prefer to use it at home over the crib. I just fold it up and put it aside during the day, then pop it back up at night so that my baby sleeps right next to my bed. It is bigger than most bassinets, and it does take up more space. But being able to fold it up so easily and keep it out of the way when not in use makes up for the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Alright except for uneven mattress
customer_reviews.text: The dent at the center is really annoying. It's okay for my newborn at the moment since I can position him in a way that he won't feel it, but once he's a little bigger I'll need to figure something else out. Maybe put a blanket underneath the cover to even it out. I wish I didn't have to do that since the size of the bassinet is good and so is the convenience of being able to move it from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I love that it is a large ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love that it is a large safe sleep space that accommodates babies up to 33 pounds (as long as they aren't pulling themselves up on all fours). Great price and value, and very easy to travel with, as it folds very easily and comes with its own travel bag. Wish we had had it since day one, highly recommend for anyone who is concerned with safe sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay3252

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet. My guy outgrew his little bassinet so I bought this one. I travel with it, it folds in literally one second, it fits in a small bag, great price, and it's huge! It doesn't take up a ton of space but my guy is 27" and can still stretch out and goes up to 33 lbs. I wish I had bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel or when your baby has outgrown the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel or when your baby has outgrown the halo, but you still don’t want to put her in the crib! Travels overseas and a couple hours away with this bassinet and I’m so thankful I bought it. It was a lifesaver and since it was super similar to the bassinet she already has she didn’t even notice anything different! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Varley

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for a halo
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bassinet!!!! No assembly! Looks nice and modern and has safe mesh siding do u can always see baby. Really light and easy to move too, so glad I didn’t get the traditional kind. This looks like a dupe for the halo bassinet for 1/3 rd the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet- use your changing pad covers
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect oversized on the go or in your home bassinet!! FYI your changing pad covers will fit this pad for a sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Colby Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Awful mattress
customer_reviews.text: The GIANT crease in the middle of the mattress is killing me. The baby hates sleeping near the middle because it’s so profound
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It’s one of the best items I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have used this little bassinet so much. It’s one of the best items I purchased. I use it as a mini play pen during the day. It’s grest for that because it’s easy to drag it from room to room. And I can interact with my baby while she has lots of room to kick around. Additionally, I use it with the cubby cove co sleeper for my 3 month old to sleep in at night. She’s very cozy in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. It comes with a nice tote bag to carry. Wish I would have bought sooner.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Great safe sleep surface for newborn
customer_reviews.text: This has been a perfect secondary sleep area for our newborn. We use it in our living room most of the time then I move it to my in home studio when I have to spend several hours working. Our baby will nap here for an hour or so sometimes. It's a great alternative to the rock n play type "sleepers" that are technically unsafe sleep surfaces due to the recline. However, don't buy it for the rocking feature. It's not smooth at all and would cause him to roll around. Definitely not a soothing rocking motion. I'm happy with the purchase because he will sleep here even without the rocking.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Safe and roomy easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent travel bassinet. My six month old still has lots of room to grow inside it. But I imagine when the baby starts standing up it won't work well anymore. A sitting baby still fits the depth of it. No problem with rolling either. Both sides are meshed so even when baby rolls to the side it's still ok. The bare mattress is safe, even though it feels cold. Assembling takes one to two minutes, snapping on the extended legs and unfold it. Much easier than Graco pack and play bassinet. Carrying bag is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Eva W.Brodbeck

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I read multiple reviews on this bassinet but I was still surprised by the major bump in the mattress where it folds. I cannot stress this enough. The bump is large enough that if your baby lays right in the middle they are not laying flat and it is very uncomfortable. I love the idea of this bassinet. You can see the baby very easily, it's very portable and it's affordable(unlike some others). Unfortunately, because of that bump as soon as she doesn't fit on one side or the other of said bump our little one will need to move to her crib.
customer_reviews.author: Motherof3

customer_reviews.title: Would give it a 4.5
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this bassinet. It's easy to deal with and pretty straight forward. The design has been well thought out. I appreciate the breathability this specific model has compared to its competitors. I love that its oversized because my baby is long legged like us and needs the extra leg room. He will be able to stay in this awhile! Only negative is that my baby does prefer his crib mattress over the somewhat harder surface this bassinet has. I wish they made a inch or two thick insert just to add some comfort to it. Overall I would recommend it The
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: So let me first say what we received was exactly as pictured. Mesh all the way around which is very important as our baby has rolled onto his side and his face was in the side. . Once you lock the feet in place this does not rock even on carpet. It has been pretty sturdy. You have the make sure the feet lock in place though if you don't want it to rock. We move this from bedroom to living room daily. It has been easy to fold up and move around. There is a crease in the middle where it folds but it doesn't affect baby.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Happy enough with this product
customer_reviews.text: Good bassinet as a second one or around the house. It is much larger than I expected. Our son will use this for a long time. I haven’t taken it anywhere as it’s our daytime nap bassinet for our first floor. But I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is perfect. Every fabric part comes off so you can wash it if need be, and I love how easy it is to fold up and put away. Every person I have showed this to loves it and is always shocked when they see that it rocks. It’s like the dress with pockets of the bassinet world. So happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This bassinet/rocker is pretty cool. You can rock it
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet/rocker is pretty cool. You can rock it, it is flat instead of at an angle like many bassinet/rockers, it's portable, folds up easily and seems sturdy. It's big though. I returned it because it was larger than I needed and didn't fit in the primary space I was purchasing for. Definitely read the dimensions before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: HillKat

customer_reviews.title: Life saving purchase for two under two
customer_reviews.text: I originally was looking at baby bouncers for my newborn. I already have a toddler and cosleep so bought this last minute since I figured cosleeping at night may have been a little dangerous. Turns out I need this thing all day everyday. It makes it so I can see my newborn all the time and drag it around the house so my toddler can’t accidentally kill the baby while I go to the bathroom or cook a meal. It’s also high enough so my toddler can’t easily hit the baby or jump into the bassinet. My newborn has been sleeping in it constantly and it’s been super handy
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Riley

customer_reviews.title: Bulge in mattress with sheets
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed this did not work out. Loved the idea of it being portable. Finding sheets that fit was difficult. I tried a few different ones and all of them appeared to fit however the mattress would have a bulge in the middle. We ended up returning it and getting a different bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and spacious
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We are easily able to move it from bedside to living room so that our newborn is always nearby. My one gripe is that the mattress covering is cool and shocks the babe a little bit when we put her down. They might sell a mattress pad to go over the grey chevron one. Still definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one after my baby has out grown her rock and play sleeper at 1.5 months. I waited until she was 2 months to purchase the bed and she slept through the night since then. I kind of wish I bought this earlier. After researching different beds, I decided on this one due to its size (not too bulky yet roomy. My baby was born on a larger size) I need something to last a little longer while it’s not too bulky like pack and play. It’s easy to assemble and disassemble. It came with a nice travel bag. It’s lightweight so you can take it anywhere. I’m very please with my purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for travel and for our living room. It is so easy to assemble and disassemble. I can do it one handed if I need to and super quick! It also folds up pretty small so it fits nicely in the back of our vehicle. We use it all the time as a second bassinet in the living room with our little guy. He seems to love it and will nap no problem. We haven't used the rocking feature much just because I don't want the little guy to roll over, but it is super sturdy when you have the feet in the non rocking position. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Clark

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that it is so compact when not ...
customer_reviews.text: Just set up the bassinet and so far it looks promising (my son is due next month). I love the fact that it is so compact when not in use and the high weight limit- all other bassinets usually average about 20 lbs or so. Only issue I see is maybe getting something more softer for a mattress but will try to see if I can find something to add on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this bassinet in our family room for over 3 months now (my son's 15 weeks old). We love how we can see inside no matter where are in the family room and I think that my son likes waking up and being able to look out (he doesn't even cry anymore when he wakes up, he just looks around like "hey guys".
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, comfy, and portable!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for my daughter up until she was seven months. When she turned seven months, I had to give it away for safety purposes because she started pulling up on her hands and knees and I was worried that she’d fall out. I really wish that I had gotten this for her since day one. It’s extremely spacious and portable. Literally all you have to do is pull the tab in the middle and you can take it with you on your travels. I honestly wanted to keep this handy little bassinet forever. My daughter and I loved this bassinet and I’m sure you will too!
customer_reviews.author: LesLeaLuvShopping

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your item is all mesh!
customer_reviews.text: I have twins, so I registered for two of these. Oddly enough, one of the products was as pictured and was mesh all the way around, including the area around the support frame. The other one I received was the gray, non-breathable material around the support frame, which posed a sleeping hazard. The pad was also puffy, causing the sheet to bunch up. I also felt this was dangerous. I returned the defective one and received a correct one, but just be sure you, too, don't receive one that would impair safe sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: See through so my daughter can see us!
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in the living room. I put my baby there when we are there as well. She can see us moving, talking. She has plenty of space to move around. It's stable. If I wanted her to sleep there, I would probably put some more cushion on the mattress. Changing pad sheets fit perfectly ! We are very satysfied.
customer_reviews.author: Danuta W

customer_reviews.title: Good but the folding button is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Works great very large, fits dockatot! The only Problem I have with this is how you fold it there is a button you kind of have to push in on the bottom and it holds a metal bar in place when you push it (and it’s extremely hard to do so) the bar shoots forward the tip of my finger got caught and crushed had to be glued back on
customer_reviews.author: Kyle and Hannah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the picky sleeper/traveling family.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect. Our little girl would not sleep in a bassinet that swaddled her so we went with this and have put her in anything else since. We have taken it on 2 trips as well and this thing is the best for traveling. Takes up little room in the truck and is easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: this bassinet is a must and is well made
customer_reviews.text: almost returned this one only because my daughter sleeps in her crib now at 3 months instead of the rock and play which she got too big for and why we bought this instead. glad we decided to keep it because she loves to sleep in this when we travel or to nap in our living room. Its very roomy and I wish I had see this sooner and might have by passed the rock and play altogether since this one will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: First time mom! Wouldn’t known what to do without this bassinet. We both love it. It even rocks and it has a lot of room. Durable as well, expecting to use for awhile. Until he is able to climb out. I have traveled with it as well. Easy to fold and doesn’t require much space in the car. I added a sleeper which is visible in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Baby didn’t like it...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second child but first time using a bassinet. We loved the all mesh sides and ability to take it on the go, but the crease in the middle of the mattress is a problem. I placed a Muslim blanket under the mattress pad and sheet to try and bridge the gap but it didn’t work. Our newborn didn’t enjoy being in this bassinet. She is sleeping much better in a standard pack and play which leads me to believe it was the bassinet. Wish it would have worked for us. FYI, changing pad covers work for sheets. I bought a basic 3 pack on amazon and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Knurse

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than expected but it is perfect! It is sturdy and easy to assemble and fold. Came with a tote to put away in. It does have a crease in the middle that bothers some people but once you put the bassinet sheet over then its fine. It Is a little on the short side so if you have a tall bed this might be a bit of an issue. We have our bed on the floor so it levels out perfect for having baby next to us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome bassinet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bassinet. It is easy to fold up and carry with us when we go to friends place. The mattress is not the best, there is a crease in the middle as that is where it folds. We use multiple layers of sheets on top, which can be tucked in without any loose sheets, so it works fine. The bassinet is pretty big, out baby is 6 months and 67cm, he still sleeps in this bassinet. It is nice to be able to have it close to our bed.
customer_reviews.author: beck79

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bassinet to keep downstairs. It is a perfect size and can be placed anywhere. Ours is next to the couch. It doesn’t need assembly, which was awesome! It folds easily, so we plan to use this when we travel to visit family. If I had seen this before, this would have been the only bassinet I purchased. I also like the mesh around that allows you to see through it.
customer_reviews.author: Mari B.

customer_reviews.title: Love! Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have had this when my other two were babies! This was great. It was larger in size and deep so I felt comfortable with her still sleeping in it even as she got bigger and could roll over. We have three under three and we bring this in addition to a portable crib we use for our two year old. Super easy to fold and carry. We are in the process of fostering and I will keep this for any potential babies we might have with us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big and infant rolls
customer_reviews.text: This is not a stable bassinet for even a newborn. I am not saying its not nice but its so large its not good for bedside. Yes, it rocks but that also means it moves even when a newborn moves the little bit they do. Since it rocks it moves the baby up against the sides of the bassinet without you rocking it. It does have the net sides for full air flow. We are only using this during the day so we can monitor the baby sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma's thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Spacious but low bassinet
customer_reviews.text: After trying to use a bassinet attachment in a pack and play I ordered this for size bassinet and it's much better for our baby to sleep in. I just wish it was a bit higher off the ground. I have to bend over significantly to put her in. I like that the sides are open so it's easy to see her lying in it.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: good bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly "travel size," but it does fold down. When it's folded up in the bag, it's maybe the size of one of those tri fold travel mattresses, minus a fold. The legs do not fold, so you have to detach them. Most annoying thing was the foam insert is split in the middle (so it can fold), but it doesn't want to quite line up, so you end up with this weird bump in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: just bought this

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy, it took five minutes to put together out of the box. We decided to not use the rocker because this baby likes being stationary, but with our last baby it would have been great! The mattress isn’t the most comfortable, but we tucked in a fluffy blanket over it to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: June Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is VERY big, I love that it is well ventilated and is easy to fold and move when needed. My baby will be able to use it for quite a while, it is very comfortable for him, he doesn't notice the seam in the middle at all. Highly recommend this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Shannah O

customer_reviews.title: Good size/easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this before the arrival of my baby to use as a bedside bassinet. It does rock, which I actually don't necessarily like, but the bottom has feet that swivel out if you don't want it to rock. My baby is 3 weeks old now, and we've already had a few messes on the cushion of the bassinet. Fortunately, the material is easy to clean even though the cushion isn't removable. The mesh on the side is easy to see through, and the bassinet is light-weight. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bassinet to keep in our bedroom during our son’s first few months and we love it. I wanted a bassinet with mesh sides, and this was the only bassinet I found that satisfied my needs. It even allows you to rock. Easy to assemble and disassemble. We plan on taking it with us while traveling too. Great bassinet for the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet portable
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet is bigger and sturdier than I expected - which is a good thing. I was worried it would be too light and small since it is portable. I’m hoping it will work for my baby until she’s about 6 months old and I think it will. It’s easy to fold and the dip in the middle is not as problematic as I expected since it doesn’t actually cave in.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and I was planning to use it for the first couple of months in our room before transitioning the baby to a crib in his own room. However, has an emergency c-section and it was not easy to get my baby out of this bassinet as it is very low. Would not recommend if you are using right after having a c-section. What I also notice is like some other reviews state, there is a bump in the middle of the mattress when you fold it out which does not look comfortable for the baby. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We took our five week old on trip to Utah. We drove so we needed this for the overnight stop we made in the way there and back. It was such a lifesaver.I like that you can see the baby through the mesh which makes it easier at night to take a peek and be at ease. The only issue I had was with folding. You have to pull very hard on the handle in the middle to get it to fold. Other than that it was a great buy and works perfectly wherever we need it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a bassinet
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bassinet we bought after returning the 1st of a different brand for safety reasons. This bassinet is easy to assemble and seems to meet all of the guidelines for infant sleep. I only gave 4 stars because I feel the mattress could be a little thicker /more cushioned for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Really big!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bassinet. It’s easy to put together and easy to travel with. It’s also really big, which is great, because my 1month old is tall, so she can still enjoy it for a few months. The biloban changing pad cover and pack n play sheet cover fit perfect. The only thing they need to add are wheels to move it easier
customer_reviews.author: Kay Tjin A Tam

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this with my first child!! Amazingly compact, lightweight, easy to tote and my baby sleeps so sound!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for rock n play
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bassinet. I was stressed because with past babies I’ve used the rock n play and didn’t know what to get for this one after that got recalled. I read some reviews and decided to give this a try and we really love it. So easy to fold and assemble, and I can lay baby flat and know he’s safe. He loves to snuggle up to the sides, so I’m glad the mesh sides are breathable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycie Eddie

customer_reviews.title: great as both a permanent and travel bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 kids with my twins born in May 2019. I bought 2 of these for the twins, and these are amazing! Easy to fold and set up for travel, sturdy for permanent placement in your house, and these are a great size! My boys are both about 3 months old and 12 pounds each in weight right now and they still have plenty of room to in these bassinets. These bassinets have longevity and feel safe and sturdy, and that makes me feel like i got a great value with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Conlin

customer_reviews.title: No sheets fit it correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I am very frustrated with your bassinet. Got it to replace a rock & play, but no. Sheets fit it. Even with following the prompt to specifically look only for MiClassic sheets, I have ordered my daughter 2 different sets of sheets that are both too small. A baby bassinet that does not have sheets ia almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: mikinp

customer_reviews.title: Nice large bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bassinet. It's large and deep. I would feel comfortable putting a baby sitting unassisted in there awake. I will say I don't recommend using the rocking function for a swaddled baby. My newborn rolled over twice while swaddled. Thank goodness we were right there. I'm not sure if that's in the directions or not. It's so easy to fold and move while holding a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie610

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bassinet. First, the quality and construction is just great. The design is well thought out, and it's a very nice size/larger bassinet that really doesn't take up much space or feel bulky! I love this because I make big babies and they'll be able to use this bassinet for a long time. The portability can't be beat either. It couldn't be easier to fold up. Perfect for traveling and get togethers. One of my all-time favorite baby purchases.
customer_reviews.author: HaleyFaye

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: Great size bassinet for your room. Easy to assemble. Easy to fold up and nice to use. My little one seems to like it. *update* it’s starting to fall apart 😡 the sides are tearing.
customer_reviews.author: CaffeinatedWithKids

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: way better than spending $200+ on the one we were looking at. It works well, and easy to put together. not a huge fan of the cardboard liner on the base, but our son sleeps in it every night for 7-9 hrs without issue. We don't use the rocking feature and sometimes he gets his face close to the side and that makes me nervous, but overall I like it and would recommend trying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: So safe!
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this bassinet enough! My LO is now 6 weeks old and we love how convenient it is to have her in our room and safe in her own bed! She is a wiggle worm who has many nights scooted herself to one of the mesh walls while sleeping and I have had peace of mind that she would be able to breathe fine! Also the height is perfect for right next to a standard bed size, the top is level with our bed making it easy to look in on her and scoop her out! So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Green

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my granddaughter in anticipation of her first baby. She told me she loves it and it was easy to assemble. The baby is expected in a week.
customer_reviews.author: M. M M.

customer_reviews.title: Other people seem to love it
customer_reviews.text: I can see why people would like this product, but I think I got a defective one. I had to return it because my baby rolled in it (when only a week old). It wasn’t level. Good news is seller was great to work with for the return, so if you see the other positive reviews there are lots of reasons to try/buy.
customer_reviews.author: PhDmom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Received my package on time and box was also in good condition. I set it up in less than 3 mins and didn't really need any instructions because it looked pretty simple. It seems quite sturdy and of good quality. The little dip in the middle where it gets folded is pretty noticeable but hopefully when LO gets here ina fee weeks it won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: JMolina

customer_reviews.title: Practical but Potentially Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is practical for infants that sleep swaddled but shouldn’t be used if your baby is able to roll themselves over. The non mesh areas on the sides could pose a safety hazard and possible smothering situation. Fortunately this was only purchased to be used during the day while I’m up and able to watch her, and not when she’s sleeping in an unswaddled state.
customer_reviews.author: ASU Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and put away, very sturdy, excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a portable bassinet that I can take from room to room or to other peoples houses. This bassinet exceeded my expectations on quality especially for the price. It's very sturdy, and easy to disassemble and reassemble. Simply remove the legs and fold, put it in the bag it easily fits in and go if need be. I highly recommend this product, just be careful if you have pets who jump.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Foley

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product until the first night our newborn slept in it. The product is very sturdy, folds away nicely, easy to carry etc. But it is almost rock hard, our newborn woke up every hour screaming and we couldnt figure out why. One night we placed him in his crib to sleep and he slept soundly for the whole night. It is nice, but would definitely need to purchase something softer to go over the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Tami R

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that I can move room to room. This was perfect. I originally went to the store and all the good bassinet were over priced. I took the risk on this one and our son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet!! My baby is 5 almost 6 months old and still sleeping in it. It’s very sturdy yet very easy to move around. It is an odd shape so it’s a little hard to find sheets for, but other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great baby bed for our newborn
customer_reviews.text: We just received this and it's the perfect size for our bedroom to go next to our bed. It's sturdy and not too heavy so I can easily move it into a different room. It also folds up well and my daughter who is now 3 weeks still looks so tiny in it, so I definitely think it will last for her to sleep in up to 6 months. Also, the design is simple and I like the beige color.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.S

customer_reviews.title: Big bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Bassinet. I didn’t think it would be as big as it is. It’s super easy to fold. Not easy to find a sheet that fits so make sure to look at the measurements first or search for Miclassic bassinet sheets. It rocks which is really nice. It’s not automatic. It doesn’t vibrate but then my baby doesn’t like the vibration so it didn’t matter. Great product. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly spacious and great height
customer_reviews.text: love the height of the bassinet, I have a 2yr old that's very curious, so I feel like it keeps him safe 😉 I gave it 4 stars because of the color options, I wish it was a darker grey because again I have a 2yr old. Also, because of my own assumption, I thought it would have been smaller because it's portable but it's surprisingly spacious which ends up being a great thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bassinet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome! Super easy to pack up and move, very large bassinet, light weight, and storage is a breeze. I’m so glad that I chose this one for my son!
customer_reviews.author: SREngbrecht

customer_reviews.title: The best bassinet we've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet! Can't believe how durable, light-weight, and ease to fold this bassinet is! Very pleased with this. Really like how the pad is Velcroed down! We like how this bassinet can be converted into a rocker from a solid base in a very easy step! Very neat feature! Highly recommend this bassinet to anybody! Very great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amée & Joe

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BASSINET!! I wish I had gotten this when my son was born. We got it when he turned three months because he’s a big baby. He’s currently 5 months and weighs 18lbs and is 28” long, he still has so much room to grow! Definitely my favorite item.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow the best product I have bought on Amazon. My baby loves it and its very good quality . He’s a big boy for 3.5 months and grew out of his graco pack and play bassinet bought this with a wedge and he sleeps great. This is something you can have for when you’re traveling whether it is to visit family or out of country you can easily grab this and go.
customer_reviews.author: isis

customer_reviews.title: More than happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We were looking to replace the rock n play after the recent recall and were not sure of what we would really like. We have loved this bassinet. I don't use the rocking feature as much with this one and it is bigger than the rock n play. However, I love the size (hopefully we will be able to use it for longer with this baby) and we love how easy it is to transport. I also really like how stable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Big_B

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall
customer_reviews.text: Great overall. One minor nitpick: when you have to wash the sheets, getting them back on without the mattress getting crumpled is tough—especially if the sheets were dried on high heat and shrunk a bit. I had to pull the sheets out to stretch them a bit to get it all back. Otherwise, a great bed.
customer_reviews.author: asdf

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome if you travel a lot. Getting a pack’n’play at a hotel can be a nightmare and you never know how clean it is. This pack up much smaller than a pack’n’play too. Put my 4 year old in it to test out for the new baby. He said it was cool
customer_reviews.author: Jasseu

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought. Super easy to set up, just pop the legs on. Comes in a convenient travel bag. The pad comes out easily which is nice for cleaning purposes. The crack in the middle however seems uncomfortable so I will likely get a pad and/or sheet. Overall, happy with the product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. The price is great and I love that the mesh is everywhere. I like that you can fold the kick stands up to rock or down to keep it still. My baby slept great in it. It is so convenient. It folds up very easily and comes with a carrying bag which makes it even easier to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my twins!
customer_reviews.text: These were fantastic! We ordered two for our twins and set them up next to each other. The twins slept in them great and we loved that they folded down so easy. The sheets were a little difficult to get right but once we did, it was great! We were sad when they grew out of these as they were so convenient but would completely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lovethefall123

customer_reviews.title: Wider And low
customer_reviews.text: Very wide!! My newborn was turning sideways in it!! It is sturdy, quality materials and stable, I felt good about leaving my little one in it and know it wasn’t going to collapse or tip over if she started moving around! It is very low, so reaching into it from bed height was challenging when you are laying in bed and it is bedside. Other than that it is a good bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically so it would be safe for my baby to sleep in at night with the breathable mesh but there is 4 pretty large spots that aren’t mesh, making this not safe for night time sleep. It is very large and easy to travel with on the up side.
customer_reviews.author: Hairstylist11

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge. I do not like how big it is, does not fit normal bassinet blankets. I read reviews saying it is also unsafe I wanted to return but figured we can just keep it. I took it off the rocking mode and don’t plan to ever use the rocking mode. And only use this for baby to lay while we watch tv at his grandmas .. I like the waterproof mat
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Chen

customer_reviews.title: Main crib for my baby for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: We kept my baby in our room for 6 months and this was great for it. Not the most comfortable mattress, and she is much happier now in her nice crib in her room, but it served its purpose. In her first months we would also move it around the house so she would be sleeping close to us in the kitchen or living room. Very easy and light to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: still using at 5 months old
customer_reviews.text: my daughter sleeps in this next to our bed every night still at 5 months old. i like how large and deep it is so she can grow and still have room. we have taken on vacation with us and it was very easy to breakdown and put back together. it comes with a convenient travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: WorkinLady

customer_reviews.title: Big and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I just put this bassinet together 36 weeks pregnant super easy! I like that it’s so big means baby can sleep it in for at least 3-4 months!! Love the mesh all around and perfect height for me! Overall happy with it. Make sure you buy a cover for it as the folding part is pretty noticeable in the middle. If you buy sheets from here make sure you get the correct size the one advertised with it is the “bassinet size” well this is a bigger bassinet so that won’t fit, but the changing pad covers will first perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Best transitional bed from bassinet to crib
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed because my daughter was quickly outgrowing her bassinet and I still wanted her to sleep next our bed. Not only does she have plenty of room to move around (she’s seven months old, 19lbs and 27.5” long/tall) but it doubles for a pack n play/changing table for my mother who babysits. Easy to fold and move around the house. A pack n play is too large/bulky to fit comfortably by our bedside. This is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenience of this foldable bassinet and the size is perfect. The down side is that you can’t find sheets that fit this thing well ANYWHERE! And if you put sheets that are at all snug on it, a huge bulge forms through the middle of the mattress that makes it very uncomfortable for baby. Unfortunately, we noticed that too late and now we have a permanent bulge through ours that won’t go away. Our baby gets very wiggly and ends up wriggling to one side so that he’s not laying on it. There’s no rating for comfort, but that’s where it loses points for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Aversa

customer_reviews.title: Baby can swim in it LOL
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bassinet it rocks. There is also so much room until the baby is at least 10 month old. I was going to get a crib but I might not need one with how big this bassinet is and it's small enough to fit next to my bed. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bre scott

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift twice. The First Baby is still small and they love this bassinet. Wife recommended it to her cousin - that baby not born yet, but the parents are delighted with it. They have proved it can be opened or closed in one second.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Only good to use once in a while
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this bassinet was the size. It was pretty big compared to other bassinets. The sturdiness was questionable and the foam pad is very thin. It was a cheaper bassinet so maybe that's why the quality wasn't so great.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

product_meta.title: 2in1 Stationary&Rock Mode Bassinet One-Second Fold Travel Crib Portable Newborn Baby,Gray
product_meta.description:
Color:Gray

☑ One-second open&fold system makes bassinet easy to transport or store. Please have a "QUICK PULL UP" to fold it!

☑ Folds compactly into included carry bag.

☑ Rock mode to soothe baby and stationary mode when asleep.

☑ Surrounded by breathable mesh and easy for parents to communicate with your baby.

☑ This product complies with the applicable regulations, rules, bans and standards under CPSIA, and/or any other acts enforced by the CPSC. 

☑ ONE YEAR quality warranty.
feature_bullets: Bassinet can be STATIONARY! Rock modeis only used to soothe baby.
One-second open&fold system makes bassinet easy to transport or store. Please have a "QUICK PULL UP" to fold it!
Surrounded by breathable mesh and easy for parents to communicate with your baby.
Folds compactly into included carry bag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,339 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
